author: Special Correspondent
text:
Accusing the BJP government of “slowing down” the CBI probe against Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik to win the support of the Biju Janta Dal in Parliament, the Congress on Sunday demanded a Supreme Court-monitored probe into the alleged mining and chit fund scam in the State.

“Prime Minister Narendra Modi is misusing the CBI to protect the Patnaik government,” said former Minister Jairam Ramesh.

He said Mr. Modi had struck a deal with Mr.Patnaik after the CBI had almost cracked the chit fund case and reached the “doorsteps” of the Chief Minister.
title: Modi govt. let Odisha CM off the hook: Cong.
